name: @jimkang/autoc
description: Inspired by [node-autocorrelation](https://github.com/MaximilianBuegler/node-autocorrelation), this is an implementation of autocorrelation as [explained by Thibauld Nion](https://etudes.tibonihoo.net/literate_musing/autocorrelations.html). I'm implementing it in order to understand it.
author: Jim Kang
